reviewText: I was so happy to get this movie. Netflix quit carrying it so I had to purchase the DVD to watch it.

Has all the ingredients for good family entertainment that cut across all ages and all races.  I gave it 3-stars because I could not see Lee Majors in all 4 stories of Vol. 1, even though his name appeared on the DVD heading.
If you liked the movie Lonesome Dove, you'll love the series. Great actors, including Dennis Weaver.
This is the first disk in the LONESOME DOVE SERIES. I sure hope they release all five disks and also release single disks of LONESOME DOVE/ THE OUTLAW YEARS. Well worth your money.
